author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...KAREN LOSES SUBTROPICAL CHARACTERISTICS OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC...
summary: ...KAREN LOSES SUBTROPICAL CHARACTERISTICS OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC... As of 9:00 PM GMT Fri Oct 10 the center of Karen was located near 47.5, -30.2 with movement NNE at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

summary_detail.value: ...KAREN LOSES SUBTROPICAL CHARACTERISTICS OVER THE NORTH ATLANTIC... As of 9:00 PM GMT Fri Oct 10 the center of Karen was located near 47.5, -30.2 with movement NNE at 16 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1000 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 45 mph.

title: Summary - Post-Tropical Cyclone Karen (AT1/AL112025)
